item.title: Onboard Communication Over an I2C Bus
item.description: For reasons documentented in Micro Communicaiton Options and RPI Vs. Arduion we established the reasons why our vehicle will host a couple arduino’s and a Raspberry Pi. Macro to Micro Controller Communication Our basic architecture has the Raspberry Pi controlling show on the Vehical itself. The Arduino’s are used to collect sensor inputs then send them to the macro-controller for further processing and storage. RPI Master Arduino Slave Sensor Inputs Motor Outputs Todo A single simple image
